name: smu-guide
description: The Student Mentor Guide is a web-based platform that connects university students with mentors, including alumni and professors. The system allows students to browse mentor profiles, book Zoom meetings, ask questions through a community forum, and send direct messages for quick support. Built with a Node.js + TypeScript backend and modern frontend, the platform ensures smooth scheduling, secure authentication, and an easy-to-use interface for effective academic guidance and mentorship.
author: Sridhar Vadla
